Subject: Instalación de Servidor OnPremise
Description:
Buenos Dias, estamos trabajando en montar un servidor on-premise de un entorno de Enpoint Protector, para utilizar las funcionalidades de DLP, estuvimos viendo los detalle de la pagina y no estamos viendo el proceso de instalación en Proxmox, les agradeceria si nos pueden brindar una ayuda para montar el servidor en un entorno virtualizado de proxmox.

Saludos.
What_We_Know__c:
4/23/2025
-Sent customer follow up email

4/18/2025

- Sent customer information on users and groups via email

4/17/2025

- Joined remote session
- Customer configured the VM 
- Customer can not connect to EPP UI console
- Accessed backend and Emil discovered that user did not configure second NIC card
- User configured the virtual hardware via Proxmox to include second NIC
- Completed Network connfiguration from VM UI.
- Customer now able to log into EPP UI without issue

* Customer has a question on how to add Linux users 

The customer asked for help in order to deploy the EPP VM in Proxmox.
Solution_Comment__c:
Assisted customer in configuring second NIC on VM
Customer now able to access the EPP UI via browser
Account_Name__c: Tribunal Electoral de la Provincia de Misiones
